      • containsScheme

        public boolean containsScheme(java.lang.String name,
                              boolean projectScheme)
        Specified by:
        containsScheme in interface SchemesModel<com.intellij.openapi.keymap.impl.ui.KeymapScheme>
        Parameters:
        name - The scheme to check.
        projectScheme - Level of the scheme to check. If schemes model does not support project level schemes then the parameter is always equal to false.
        Returns:
        True if a scheme by the given name already exists.

      • differsFromDefault

        public boolean differsFromDefault(com.intellij.openapi.keymap.impl.ui.KeymapScheme scheme)
        Specified by:
        differsFromDefault in interface SchemesModel<com.intellij.openapi.keymap.impl.ui.KeymapScheme>
        Parameters:
        scheme - The scheme to check.
        Returns:
        True if scheme's settings differ from default values (presets). The method is called only if SchemesModel.canResetScheme(Scheme) returns true.

      • canResetScheme

        public boolean canResetScheme(com.intellij.openapi.keymap.impl.ui.KeymapScheme scheme)
        Specified by:
        canResetScheme in interface SchemesModel<com.intellij.openapi.keymap.impl.ui.KeymapScheme>
        Parameters:
        scheme - The scheme to check.
        Returns:
        True if the scheme can be reset from default values (presets) in principle regardless of whether scheme settings actually differ from presets or not.
        See Also:
        SchemesModel.differsFromDefault(Scheme)
